titles.title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that foods derived from plant varieties developed by methods of genetic modification be labeled to identify their derivation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1294)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to deem a food misbranded if it is derived from a plant developed by genetic modification unless it is so labeled.
